data.text:
Polar bears are facing a very bleak future. By the end of the century, they could become nearly extinct. 

We care about actively reducing our carbon footprint. We're doing our part. Are you doing yours? https://t.co/Cae0UqpmuF 

#savethepolarbears @rewild @World_Wildlife https://t.co/WS5EpnLyvY

entity.name: Remembering Betty White on her birthday
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

entity.name: 🎂18日は山崎育三郎さんの誕生日
🎂18日は白井悠介さんの誕生日
Remembering Betty White on her 100th birthday 🎂
entity.description:
Legendary actress and comedian Betty White would have turned 100 years old on January 17, 2022. Her death came as a shock to the world, as she passed away weeks ahead of her birthday on December 31, 2021. 

Family, friends, and fans now join together to honor her memory and celebrate the icon’s long life:
- A special one-day-only movie event, now called Betty White: A Celebration, features a star-studded cast and airs in nearly 900 theaters across the US.
- Fans on social media participate in an unofficial #BettyWhiteChallenge with the goal of raising awareness and funds for one of White’s nearest and dearest causes - animals.  
- White's hometown of Oak Park, Illinois, is recognizing her birthday as “Betty White Day” and filling the village’s downtown area with memorabilia, performances, and festivities for the late star on January 15.

Share your favorite memory of Betty White and tell us how you are celebrating the legendary Emmy Award-winning actress on what would have been her 100th birthday!

data.text: From one Betty to another, Happy Birthday #BettyWhite! #bettythebluebird https://t.co/zEgR1Rymc4

data.text:
FA Gwendolyn Walker shared with us this photo taken in the 1960s of her grandfather, John E. Walker (center), a local minister in Denver, with close friend Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. (right).

We remember the inspiring message put forth by Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. #MLKDay https://t.co/AqNhYvl3FN

urls.title: Committed To You
urls.description: Frontier remains committed to ensuring that the Sky is for Everyone. This means going the extra mile in all that we do to safeguard your well-being.

data.text: Our system uses HEPA filters capable of capturing respiratory virus particles at more than 99.9% efficiency. These are the same filters used in hospitals and doctors' offices. Here’s a more specific look at what we’re doing onboard: https://t.co/3l4OWP1VOq https://t.co/RQ1Ng4BYmY

urls.title: Top Ten Safest Low-Cost Airlines for 2022 - Airline Ratings
urls.description: AirlineRatings.com. the world’s only safety, product, and COVID-19 rating agency, has listed its top ten safest low-cost airlines for 2022 from the 385 airlines it monitors. Low-cost carriers (LCCs) have allowed millions of people to travel for the first time or to take trips they would otherwise be unable to afford. The AirlineRatings top 10 […]

urls.title: International Travel - Frontier
urls.description: Now is the perfect time to travel to Mexico and explore paradise! Find the lowest fares to the best Mexico locations. Some of our favorites include Cancun, Guatemala City, Guadalajara and more! Looking for a unique relaxing getaway? Book the Caribbean as your next adventure. Explore the majestic waterfalls of Jamaica, the turquoise waters of the Bahamas and so much more. When thinking about international travel, put Central America at the top of your list.
